scripts.setup:ptau: snarkjs powersOfTau new bn128 12 ptau/pot12_0000.ptau && snarkjs powersOfTau contribute ptau/pot12_0000.ptau ptau/pot12_0000.ptau --name="first contribution" && snarkjs powersOfTau prepare phase2 ptau/pot12_0000.ptau ptau/pot12_final.ptau
scripts.setup:zkey: snarkjs plonk setup circuits/bgTrait.r1cs ptau/pot12_final.ptau bgTrait.zkey && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey bgTrait.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.prove: node circuits/bgTrait_js/generate_witness.js circuits/bgTrait_js/bgTrait.wasm input.json witness.wtns && snarkjs plonk prove bgTrait.zkey witness.wtns proof.json public.json
scripts.verify: snarkjs plonk verify verification_key.json public.json proof.json
